TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PrintSystemDesiredAccess extends System.Enum

summary.span: Specifies the different access rights (or levels of access) for printing objects.

span.span: Specifies the different access rights (or levels of access) for printing objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Os direitos de acesso que estão disponíveis em cada nível de acesso variam de acordo com o seguinte:The access rights that are available at each level of access vary according to the following: - Se o servidor de impressão é um computador ou um dispositivo do servidor de impressão.Whether the print server is a computer or a print server appliance. - O sistema operacional que é usado.The operating system that is used. - As atualizações de segurança que estão instaladas.The security updates that are installed. - As políticas de segurança que têm suporte.The security policies that are supported. Por esse motivo, as descrições de direito de acesso na seção "Membros" são típicas dos direitos que correspondam a cada nível de acesso, mas os níveis de acesso listados podem fornecer direitos de mais ou menos em determinados sistemas.For this reason, access right descriptions in the "Members" section are typical of the rights that will correspond to each access level, but the access levels listed may provide more or fewer rights on particular systems. Esses valores são principalmente usados como parâmetros para e construtores.These values are primarily used as parameters for and constructors. Os construtores lançará exceções se você usar um valor que pode ser aplicadas apenas a outro tipo de objeto.The constructors will throw exceptions if you use a value that can apply only to another kind of object. Por exemplo, não passe AdministratePrinter para um construtor.For example, do not pass AdministratePrinter to a constructor. ## Examples O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar essa enumeração para instalar uma segunda impressora que difere em suas propriedades de uma impressora existente apenas no local, porta e status compartilhado.The following example shows how to use this enumeration to install a second printer that differs in its properties from an existing printer only in location, port, and shared status. [!code-csharp[ClonePrinter#ClonePrinter](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ClonePrinter/CSharp/Program.cs#cloneprinter)] [!code-vb[ClonePrinter#ClonePrinter](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ClonePrinter/visualbasic/program.vb#cloneprinter)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PrintSystemDesiredAccess AdministratePrinter = int32(983052)

summary.span: The right to perform all administrative tasks for the print queue, including the right to pause and resume any print job; and the right to delete all jobs from the queue.

span.span: The right to perform all administrative tasks for the print queue, including the right to pause and resume any print job; and the right to delete all jobs from the queue.

summary.span: This access level also includes all rights under .

span.span: This access level also includes all rights under .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PrintSystemDesiredAccess AdministrateServer = int32(983041)

summary.span: The right to perform all administrative tasks for the print server.

span.span: The right to perform all administrative tasks for the print server.

summary.span: This access level does *not* include rights for the print queues hosted by the server.

span.span: This access level does *not* include rights for the print queues hosted by the server.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PrintSystemDesiredAccess EnumerateServer = int32(131074)

summary.span: The right to list the queues on the print server.

span.span: The right to list the queues on the print server.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PrintSystemDesiredAccess None = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PrintSystemDesiredAccess UsePrinter = int32(131080)

summary.span: The right to add print jobs to the queue and to delete and enumerate one's own jobs.

span.span: The right to add print jobs to the queue and to delete and enumerate one's own jobs.
